changePassword.title: Change Password
changePassword.description: Update your password to keep your account secure
changePassword.passwordRequirements: Must be at least 8 characters with uppercase, lowercase, number, and special character
changePassword.success: Password changed successfully! Please log out and log back in.
changePassword.error: Failed to change password. Please try again.
